snippet: After Detroit’s Miguel Cabrera fouled two balls off his lower body in the ninth inning, he recorded his first career hit against the Yankees’ Mariano Rivera.
lead_paragraph: After Detroit’s Miguel Cabrera fouled two balls off his lower body in the ninth inning, he recorded his first career hit against the Yankees’ Mariano Rivera.

headline.main: A Limping Cabrera Leaves Rivera Staggered
headline.print_headline: A Limping Cabrera Leaves Rivera Staggered
